recipeIngredient: 1 to 1.5 inch piece of ginger (peeled and minced)
1/2  green or red bell pepper thinly sliced
7 oz 1/2 a block of tofu, cubed small
1 tsp apple cider  (or distilled white vinegar)
1 tsp or more sugar  (or maple syrup)
1/2 tsp salt (less or more to taste, depends on your miso)
1 tbsp or more white mellow miso

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic, ginger and chile and cook until translucent. 4 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic, ginger and chile and cook until translucent. 4 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the carrots and peppers and cook for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the carrots and peppers and cook for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tofu and mix in. At this point you can also add in chopped veggies(chopped small) such broccoli.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tofu and mix in. At this point you can also add in chopped veggies(chopped small) such broccoli.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water, 1/3 tsp black pepper and rest of the ingredients except miso and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water, 1/3 tsp black pepper and rest of the ingredients except miso and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 4 minutes. Then add the miso and mix in. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and tang(vinegar). Simmer for another few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for 4 minutes. Then add the miso and mix in. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and tang(vinegar). Simmer for another few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with scallions and black pepper.
